Constructor Detail

HTTPS

Method Detail

considerCertificatesValid

public static void considerCertificatesValid(java.net.URLConnection uc)
Allows SSL connections to consider all certificates valid. You do need to also allow different server names too (if they might be wrong).

Parameters:
uc - Connection to ignore certs on (if not HTTPS, does nothing)

allowDifferentServerNames

public static void allowDifferentServerNames(java.net.URLConnection uc)
For use when a connection might be https; allows it to keep working even if the certificate is for a different-named server. Theoretically this reduces security, but bleh.

Parameters:
uc - Connection (can be http, in which case nothing happens, or https)
